1.content: An alien spacecraft is above the Earth. The captain of the ship is bored. He has not one young human female to study. Just then his science officer tells him that he has found some girls for the captain. "Good job! Beam these girls up to the ship. I can handle the rest." The captain then leave the bridge and goes to the beaming chamber. Who gets beamed up and experimented on?
1.title: The beginning of fear!

11.content: Kasumi was alone in her apartment, when suddenly a strange light surrounded her. She didn't have time to reacted, as the light blinded her. She felt weird, as she feel on the ground. She knew she wasn't in her apartment. She looked around, she was in a strange metal cell. It was cold, as she was only wearing.....
11.title: Kasumi is beamed up.

choices: nightgown with a robe over that
12.content: The captain tells his transporter crew member to beam up Helena which he does right away. When Helena is beamed aboard the ship, What is she wearing for clothes?
12.title: Helena is beamed up.

121.content: When Helena eyes come open she see a gun pointed at her and just walks with the captain to his bonage room. she is wearing a nightgown and a robe over that which the alien remove before putting helena on one of his devices. What is it?
121.title: nightgown with a robe over that

15.content: what other lovely lady can the aliens beam up?
15.title: other

info.brief_description: What if the girls from Dead or Alive get abducted by aliens, and are experimented on.
info.description:
This story is for adults only. If you are under the age of eighteen, please leave. If you do not like my stories, do not read them!

Aliens orbiting the Earth Abduct the Dead or Alive girls for scientific study,examination and sex. All of the girls are checked over and the younger and older Dead or Alive girls put through some very nasty procedures and experiments in idea of sex. The girls from Dead or Alive are caught and they are then made naked! Please leave some options open for other writers to add more stories.

Now for the rules. Nearly anything is allowed, but there will be no poop, piss, diapers, no weight gaining, or snot. No changing the characters gender. No short chapters, meaning no one sentence chapters, and please use proper spelling, no text messaging crap. All sexual orientations are welcome. Be as graphic and detailed as you want!

You can use second or third person point of view. This story can be centered anywhere at anytime.

Feel free to add to any storyline.
info.pretty_title: Dead or Alive Girls  Abducted by Aliens!
